name: Ultimate Tater-nauts 2: Parasitic Boogaloo - MSU Project
name_original: Ultimate Tater-nauts 2: Parasitic Boogaloo - MSU Project
description:
Credits to MSU GEL labs for base code, sprites, animations, and art

Extra art, code, animations, level design and story development done by Ethan Powell

*When playing in browser, levels are best experienced in full screen*

Full list of Modifications

  • Updated the Main Menu art
  • Added a storyline to the game
  • Created an instructions page with the backstory for the game
  • created and designed 4 different levels
  • coded and designed a monologue box
  • coded a spawner and trigger set for dialogue and game element spawns
  • Created a new enemy design fit with animations
  • added extra background art
